version.description: The version of the saved form.

actions.description: Represents a set of action definitions.

errorProps.description: Properties of the component displaying the error.

modalType.description: Name of the type of component that displays the modal.

tooltipType.description: Name of the type of component that displays the tooltip.

errorType.description: Name of the type of component displaying the error.

form.description: Settings for components that display the form.

description: The scheme describes the JSON structure and the set of components used

PersistedFormVersion.description: The version of the saved form.

ActionValues.description: Represents a set of action definitions.

propertyNames.description: The type for the parameter name.

ActionParameters.description: Represents a set of action parameters.

value.description: The simple value of a component property.

fnSource.description: Source code of the function for calculating the value of a component property.

computeType.description: Type of the component's calculated property. If not specified - the value from value is used.

editorType.description: The component property editor type, only used in Designer mode.

ComponentProperty.description: The value of the component property.

Css.description: The type for the CSS property of a React component.

object.description: CSS styles defined in the general style settings.

string.description: CSS styles defined in the style code editor.

ComponentStyle.description: The type for the style property of a React component.

ActionData.description: Action Storage. Used for add a new action, store information about it.

propertyNames.description: The type for the parameter name.

Arguments.description: It will be transformed in arguments before passing in action.

ArgumentValue.description: The type of the argument value of the function.

body.description: The source code of the function for use in design mode.

autoValidate.description: Flag, if true then automatic validation of the value works, false otherwise.

validations.description: The array of validation rule settings.

key.description: The unique key of the validation rule. The key is unique within the value type.

validateWhen.description: The property that determines when validation needs to be performed.

HtmlAttribute.description: The arbitrary HTML attributes for the component.

LocalizationValue.description: The format in which localization is stored.

ComponentsLocalization.description: A record containing localizations grouped by component key.

TypedLocalization.description: A record containing localizations grouped by localization type.

ComponentPropsLocalization.description: A record containing localizations for the component properties.

name.description: the name of the language, for example 'English'.

description.description: the description of the language, for example 'American English'.

bidi.description: the type of text layout, for example, BiDi.LTR.

Language.description: The language to localize the form builder.

BiDi.description: The enumeration of bidirectional text layout types.

body.description: The source code of the Action.

allOf.description: Provide auto-complete functionality for input box

filterBy.description: Custom filter rules (will only display items that value is a substring of which by default)

menuClassName.description: A CSS class to apply to the Menu DOM

selectOnEnter.description: When set to false, the Enter key selection function is invalid

value.description: The current value (controlled)

allOf.description: A component that displays data by calendar

isoWeek.description: ISO 8601 standard, each calendar week begins on Monday and Sunday on the seventh day

value.description: The current value (controlled)

allOf.description: Check boxes are usually used in groups. Allow users to select one or more values from a set

checked.description: Specifies whether the checkbox is selected

indeterminate.description: When being a checkbox, setting styles after the child part is selected

allOf.description: DatePicker is a highly customizable component that allows users to enter and pick dates and times in different formats

calendarDefaultDate.description: Calendar panel default presentation date and time

cleanable.description: Whether the selected value can be cleared

editable.description: Rendered as an input, the date can be entered via the keyboard

format.description: Format of the date when rendered in the input

isoWeek.description: ISO 8601 standard, each calendar week begins on Monday and Sunday on the seventh day

limitEndYear.description: Set the upper limit of the available year relative to the current selection date

limitStartYear.description: Set the lower limit of the available year relative to the current selection date

value.description: The current value (controlled)

allOf.description: Time picker component with label support

value.description: The current value (controlled)

format.description: Format of the time when rendered in the input

editable.description: Rendered as an input, the time can be entered via the keyboard

cleanable.description: Whether the selected value can be cleared

allOf.description: A drop-down menu is a navigation that uses selectpicker if you want to select a value

value.description: The current value (controlled)

cleanable.description: Whether the option can be emptied

allOf.description: Input let users enter and edit text

value.description: The current value (controlled)

showPasswordAriaLabel.description: Value of the aria-label attribute for the show password button when the input is in password mask mode

allOf.description: A number format input component with validation and formatting

value.description: The current value (controlled)

allowedDecimalSeparators.description: Characters which when pressed result in a decimal separator. When missing, decimal separator and '.' are used

allowLeadingZeros.description: This allows enabling or disabling leading zeros in the input field. By default, on blur of an input, leading zeros are removed

allowNegative.description: If set to false, negative numbers will not be allowed

decimalScale.description: If defined, it limits the number of digits after the decimal point

fixedDecimalScale.description: If set to true, it adds trailing 0s after decimalSeparator to match given decimalScale

prefix.description: Adds the prefix character before the input value

suffix.description: Adds the suffix after the input value

thousandsGroupStyle.description: Thousand style (thousand) : 123,456,789, indian style (lakh) : 12,34,56,789, chinese style (wan) : 1,2345,6789

allOf.description: Pattern format input component with label support

value.description: The current value (controlled)

format.description: Format pattern using the # (or a Pattern char) character. # is the placeholder character for numbers. Example: '### ###'

mask.description: Used as mask character for numeric places, until any numeric character is provided for that position

patternChar.description: This helps define the format pattern character

allowEmptyFormatting.description: By default PatternFormat component does not apply formatting when value is empty (null, undefined or ‘’)

allOf.description: Radios are used when only one choice may be selected in a series of options

appearance.description: A radio group can have different appearances

items.description: The items for the radio group

value.description: The current value (controlled)

value.description: The current value (controlled)

cleanable.description: Whether the option can be emptied

cleanable.description: Whether the option can be emptied

value.description: The current value (controlled)

rows.description: The number of visible text lines

allOf.description: Toggle switch, used for selection between two values

checkedChildren.description: The text that is displayed in the checked state

unCheckedChildren.description: The text that is displayed in the unchecked state

loading.description: Whether the component is in loading state

allOf.description: Upload files by clicking or drag-and-drop, it supports previewing the uploaded image

accept.description: File types that can be accepted. See standard HTML attribute: accept

autoUpload.description: Automatically upload files after selecting them

customElement.description: Whether to use a custom element for the uploader

disableMultipart.description: If 'true', disable using a multipart form for file upload and instead stream the file. Some APIs (e.g. Amazon S3) may expect the file to be streamed rather than sent via a form

draggable.description: Enabled drag and drop to upload

method.description: The HTTP method of upload request

name.description: Upload the parameter name of the corresponding file

withCredentials.description: Whether to carry cookies when uploading requests

allOf.description: The button

active.description: A button can show it is currently the active user selection

appearance.description: A button can have different appearances

disabled.description: A button can show it is currently unable to be interacted with

href.description: Providing a href will render an <a> element

loading.description: A button can show a loading indicator

allOf.description: Divider are used to group content horizontally or vertically

children.description: Set the text on the dividing line

Simple HTML image
Simple HTML label
Provides a list of various forms of navigation menus, which can be landscape and portrait layout

activeKey.description: Active key, corresponding to one of items value

appearance.description: A navigation can have different appearances

itemsAs.description: HTML element to render menu item

allOf.description: Used to show important tips on a page

closable.description: Whether it is possible to close the message box

type.description: The type of the message box

Placeholder before loading the component in the form of a grid
Placeholder before loading the component in the form of a paragraph
Displaying the current progress of an operation as a circle

gapDegree.description: The gap degree of half circle, 0 ~ 360

strokeLinecap.description: The end of different types of open paths

classPrefix.description: The prefix of the component CSS class

vertical.description: The progress bar is displayed vertically

allOf.description: A static content component that displays text or HTML content
A text tip for secondary, which replaces the default title property of an HTML element
Simple HTML anchor

href.description: The URL that the hyperlink points to

target.description: Where to display the linked URL, as the name for a browsing context (a tab, window, or <iframe>)

download.description: Causes the browser to treat the linked URL as a download

downloadFilename.description: Defining a value suggests it as the filename. / and \ characters are converted to underscores (_)

allOf.description: Modal layout component with header, body and footer sections

headerTitle.description: The title for the modal header

body.description: The content for the modal body

footer.description: The content for the modal footer

allOf.description: Used to display the current page path and quickly return to the history page

separator.description: The separator between each breadcrumb item

maxItems.description: Set the maximum number of breadcrumbs to display

items.description: Array of breadcrumb items to display

allOf.description: Card is a container component for displaying data,

title.description: The title for the panel header

headerSize.description: The header size for the panel header

collapsible.description: Whether it is a collapsible panel

eventKey.description: The event key corresponding to the panel

allOf.description: Container is a layout component that can be used to wrap other components
Tabs are a set of layered sections of content, known as tab panels, that display one panel of content at a time

activeKey.description: Active key, corresponding to one of items value

appearance.description: A tab can have different appearances

pane.description: A child component of the tab

allOf.description: Wizard component with step navigation and validation

stepsNavigation.description: Determines which steps are available for navigation by clicking

showSteps.description: If true, the steps will be shown

showStepsLabels.description: If true, the steps labels will be shown

verticalSteps.description: If true, the steps will be displayed vertically

validateOnNext.description: If true, the step will be validated before moving to the next step

validateOnFinish.description: If true, the wizard will be validated before finishing the wizard

slot.description: The name of the occupied component property in the parent component.

renderWhen.description: The expression or function to conditionally render a component.

disableDataBinding.description: Disables data binding for the component.
